channel.title: NiaDing's Technical Blog
channel.description: I have research and development experience in autonomous driving simulation, and have explored related technologies such as NeRF, 3DGS and diffusion. Here, I will be sharing my insights and knowledge with everyone.

item.title: UNIFY MULTIMODAL UNDERSTANDING AND GENERATION论文分析[Show-o]
item.description:
# Introduction 多模态
# Show-o: ONE SINGLE TRANSFORMER TO UNIFY MULTIMODAL UNDERSTANDING AND GENERATION ## 离散去噪过程 ### 扩散过程： 从初始图像 x_0 开始，通过每个时间步 t 使用过渡矩阵 transition_matrix[t] 对图像进行腐蚀（加噪）。

item.title: StableDiffusion3代码分析
item.description: # StableDiffusion3Pipeline ## 步骤和算法 **输入检查：** 调用 [check_inputs]方法，验证输入参数的有效性。
